questions:

B) Daily life and people
C) Art and decoration
D) Wildlife and animals

B) Mosaic
C) Sculpture
D) Painting

A) A human figure
B) A bird
C) A landscape
D) An abstract design

A) A tree
B) A hummingbird
C) A flower
D) A fish

A) A forest
B) A tiled wall
C) A cloudy sky
D) A sandy beach

A) Red and yellow
B) Green and blue
C) Black and white
D) Orange and purple
